author: deluckybrick
title: Good for racing head-to-head
review: This is the first racer set I ever got, so I went and got a ton of them for a party. They were a hit among my friends! We raced them head to head along our hall. It was really fun, and that is what I reccomend using all the Racer products for, if you have friends or good siblings.

author: Quirrelthesquirrel
title: Rough Terrain... No Probs!
review:
This is my favourite drome racer of the series.

The small man driving the Maverick Storm has great helmet design like other drome racer minifigures, a white head (Which is unique, considering most drome racer minifigures are not wearing a racing mask), and a cool red drome racers body!

The Maverick Storm itself is great too. It has a nice colour scheme, big chunky tyres and cool detail on the hood which depicts the number 3. The red and black studs below the hood (Which I'm guessing may be suspension) add nice detail to the car.

This racer would go well with the other drome racer 4582 Red Bullet. Overall, a good set.

 

Bye :D

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Racers (Drome Racers) - Maverick Storm
review:
The Maverick Storm set (4583) is a LEGO Racers (Drome Racers) set which came out in 2002. It comes with 1 minifig and 31 pieces. This set does include no decals and there're no mistakes in the instructions and no missing pieces.

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/4583-1.jpg[/img]

Minifigures:

Driver: The driver is not a real minifig. The minifig just got a kind of stand with a steering wheel on the red stand. On the top of the stand is the head with the white mask and the green helmet with a flame on the top. The visor is movable.

Maverick Storm:

The race car for Maverick Storm is very easy to build. On the front you can see the coil springs and on the top you get a piece which has a number 3 on it. Then you have a place to put in the minifig and the engine on the back. The aluminum rims are printed green. The pull back motor does really work and the car is driving very fast.

Ideas:

author: frycook49
title: Nice!
review: This is a nice little set. The 'mini-figure' (Not sure how to describe it) is not bad either. It's fun to race with other racers, but newer racer sets won't combine as well with it. The parts included aren't bad either. It's not the greatest set, but certainly is a very nice set.
